workouts.name: Push-ups
instructions: Start in a plank position with hands shoulder-width apart
Lower your body until your chest nearly touches the floor
Push back up to the starting position
Repeat for desired number of reps

workouts.name: Jumping Jacks
instructions: Stand upright with your legs together, arms at your sides
Bend your knees slightly, and jump into the air
As you jump, spread your legs to be about shoulder-width apart
Stretch your arms out and over your head

workouts.name: Squats
instructions: Lower your body as if sitting back into a chair
Keep your chest up and knees behind your toes
Lower until thighs are parallel to the floor
Push through your heels to return to start
